description: A memorial gathering in Brussels was disrupted Sunday when far-right protesters clashed with those honoring the victims of the March 22 attacks in the city. The police used water cannons to drive back the far-right protesters.
title: Disruptions at Brussels Memorial
title_page: Disruptions at Brussels Memorial - Video - NYTimes.com
text: A memorial gathering in Brussels was disrupted Sunday when far-right protesters clashed with those honoring the victims of the March 22 attacks in the city. The police used water cannons to drive back the far-right protesters.
